mapper.sql: REC_FLOW, ORG_FLOW, ORG_NAME, DEPT_FLOW, DEPT_NAME, SCH_DEPT_FLOW, SCH_DEPT_NAME, REC_TYPE_ID, REC_TYPE_NAME, ITEM_NAME, REC_VERSION, OPER_TIME, OPER_USER_FLOW, OPER_USER_NAME, STATUS_ID, STATUS_NAME, AUDIT_TIME, AUDIT_USER_FLOW, AUDIT_USER_NAME, AUDIT_STATUS_ID, AUDIT_STATUS_NAME, HEAD_AUDIT_TIME, HEAD_AUDIT_USER_FLOW, HEAD_AUDIT_USER_NAME, HEAD_AUDIT_STATUS_ID, HEAD_AUDIT_STATUS_NAME, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW, MANAGER_AUDIT_TIME, MANAGER_AUDIT_USER_FLOW, MANAGER_AUDIT_USER_NAME, MANAGER_AUDIT_STATUS_ID, MANAGER_AUDIT_STATUS_NAME, ADMIN_AUDIT_TIME, ADMIN_AUDIT_USER_FLOW, ADMIN_AUDIT_USER_NAME, ADMIN_AUDIT_STATUS_ID, ADMIN_AUDIT_STATUS_NAME, ITEM_ID, PROCESS_FLOW, REC_FORM, SCH_ROTATION_DEPT_FLOW, MEDICINE_TYPE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from RES_REC
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT substr(info.start_time, 0, 10) AS activity_date,INFO.ACTIVITY_TYPE_NAME activity_way, SU.USER_NAME AS activity_speaker,'1' activity_period, INFO.ACTIVITY_FLOW REC_FLOW, INFO.ACTIVITY_NAME, INFO.SPEAKER_FLOW, INFO.ACTIVITY_TYPE_ID, substr(info.start_time, 0, 10) START_TIME, INFO.END_TIME, INFO.ACTIVITY_ADDRESS, INFO.ACTIVITY_REMARK, NULL REC_CONTENT, '' REC_TYPE_ID, '1' ORNIAL, INFO.CREATE_TIME FROM TEACHING_ACTIVITY_RESULT R LEFT JOIN TEACHING_ACTIVITY_INFO INFO ON R.ACTIVITY_FLOW = INFO.ACTIVITY_FLOW LEFT JOIN SCH_ARRANGE_RESULT SAR ON R.USER_FLOW = SAR.DOCTOR_FLOW LEFT JOIN SCH_ROTATION_DEPT SRD ON SAR.STANDARD_GROUP_FLOW = SRD.GROUP_FLOW AND SAR.STANDARD_DEPT_ID = SRD.STANDARD_DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_USER SU ON SU.USER_FLOW =INFO.SPEAKER_FLOW WHERE R.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND SRD.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND INFO.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND SAR.RECORD_STATUS = 'Y' AND INFO.IS_EFFECTIVE = 'Y'
AND ((SAR.SCH_START_DATE <= substr(info.start_time, 0, 10) AND SAR.SCH_END_DATE >= substr(info.end_time, 0, 10)) or (SAR.SCH_START_DATE >= substr(info.start_time, 0, 10) AND SAR.SCH_START_DATE <= substr(info.end_time, 0, 10)) or (SAR.SCH_END_DATE >= substr(info.start_time, 0, 10) AND SAR.SCH_END_DATE <= substr(info.end_time, 0, 10))) ORDER BY ORNIAL,CREATE_TIME,REC_FLOW

select
distinct
from RES_REC
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into RES_REC (REC_FLOW, ORG_FLOW, ORG_NAME, DEPT_FLOW, DEPT_NAME, SCH_DEPT_FLOW, SCH_DEPT_NAME, REC_TYPE_ID, REC_TYPE_NAME, ITEM_NAME, REC_VERSION, OPER_TIME, OPER_USER_FLOW, OPER_USER_NAME, STATUS_ID, STATUS_NAME, AUDIT_TIME, AUDIT_USER_FLOW, AUDIT_USER_NAME, AUDIT_STATUS_ID, AUDIT_STATUS_NAME, HEAD_AUDIT_TIME, HEAD_AUDIT_USER_FLOW, HEAD_AUDIT_USER_NAME, HEAD_AUDIT_STATUS_ID, HEAD_AUDIT_STATUS_NAME, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW, MANAGER_AUDIT_TIME, MANAGER_AUDIT_USER_FLOW, MANAGER_AUDIT_USER_NAME, MANAGER_AUDIT_STATUS_ID, MANAGER_AUDIT_STATUS_NAME, ADMIN_AUDIT_TIME, ADMIN_AUDIT_USER_FLOW, ADMIN_AUDIT_USER_NAME, ADMIN_AUDIT_STATUS_ID, ADMIN_AUDIT_STATUS_NAME, ITEM_ID, PROCESS_FLOW, REC_FORM, SCH_ROTATION_DEPT_FLOW, MEDICINE_TYPE, REC_CONTENT ) values (#{recFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schDeptFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
